title: Drawing, "Floor Lamp"
description: The reverse bell-shaped shade appears to be fabricated of opaque white glass, and is decorated by a geometric frieze at the top. The shade sits on a shaft, probably metallic, which tapers from top to bottom, where it again widens into the horizontal base. Shading is prominent on the sides of the lampshade and throughout the shaft.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Floor Lamp".
37.7 x 31.3 cm (14 7/8 x 12 1/4 in.). Gift of Ellen Gustav Jensen. 1956-47-37.
